tool_description: Generates formatted alerts and notifications for air quality violations, system issues, and maintenance recommendations.

alert_type.description: Type of alert: threshold_violation, system_error, maintenance_due, trend_warning

severity.description: Alert severity level: info, warning, critical, emergency

location.description: Location or zone where alert occurred

error_messages: Invalid alert type: Use threshold_violation, system_error, maintenance_due, or trend_warning.
Invalid severity: Use info, warning, critical, or emergency.
Missing required data: threshold_violation alerts require metric_name, current_value, and threshold_value.
Invalid value ranges: current_value and threshold_value must be valid numbers when provided.
usage: Specify alert_type and severity, provide relevant context like metric_name and values for threshold violations, optionally include location and custom_message.

timestamp.description: Alert generation timestamp in ISO 8601 format

priority_score.description: Numeric priority score for alert handling (1-10)

recommended_actions.description: List of recommended actions to address the alert
